company-overview.title: Company Overview
company-overview.description: Sunpeak Tech is a leading provider of innovative IT solutions, dedicated to empowering businesses through cutting-edge technology and exceptional service.
company-overview.content:
Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between complex technology and business needs, Sunpeak Tech has grown into a trusted partner for organizations across various industries. Our expertise spans from robust IT infrastructure to advanced cyber security and custom software development.

With a commitment to excellence and a passion for innovation, we deliver solutions that not only solve today's challenges but also pave the way for future growth.

vision-mission.description: Our guiding principles drive every decision we make and every project we undertake.

Our Vision

"To be the global leader in digital transformation, recognized for our commitment to innovation, integrity, and client success."

Our Mission

"To empower organizations with sustainable and secure technology solutions that drive efficiency, foster innovation, and create lasting value."

Our Core Values

  • Agility: Adapting to a changing world.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.content:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 2026

Sunpeak Tech respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

1. Information We Collect

We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows: Identity Data, Contact Data, Technical Data, and Usage Data.

2. How We Use Your Data

We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances: To provide our services, To improve our website, and To comply with a legal or regulatory obligation.
